Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • SingleItemAbstract
      • State

  • public class State
extends SingleItemAbstract
    Representation of the state of a single time step
    Version:
    09/29/17
    Author:
    Andrew H. Fagg modified by Michael Fedell
